name: cryptobot-nodejs-migration
description: CryptoBot Node.js Migration - Modern TypeScript implementation of legacy .NET trading bot

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/@cryptobot/types && npm run build && cd ../database && npm run build && cd ../indicators && npm run build && cd ../exchanges && npm run build && cd ../trading && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:packages: cd packages/@cryptobot/types && npm test && cd ../database && npm test && cd ../indicators && npm test && cd ../exchanges && npm test && cd ../trading && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:packages: cd packages/@cryptobot/types && npm run lint && cd ../database && npm run lint && cd ../indicators && npm run lint && cd ../exchanges && npm run lint && cd ../trading && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:packages && npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.typecheck:packages: cd packages/@cryptobot/types && npm run typecheck && cd ../database && npm run typecheck && cd ../indicators && npm run typecheck && cd ../exchanges && npm run typecheck && cd ../trading && npm run typecheck
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist build && rimraf packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist && rimraf backend/node_modules backend/dist && rimraf frontend/node_modules frontend/build

author: Tony Casey
